reviews.review_msg: A lot of students complained, but they did not put the required work in. The course is not easy, and you got to work for a good grade from him. He has a good sense humor and knows his stuff.

He is knowledgeable - but he does not know how to teach. He has remarkably high yet unclear expectations. His grading is subjective and arbitrary. Extremely rude and unhelpful. He is not willing to take any feedback from students so don't even try. I have nothing good to say about this professor...

A full-on academic, i.e. I doubt he has ever had a real job, which means he lives in a tiny square-shaped world and is socially clueless. He is unbelievably arrogant, the grading was arbitrary (great students went from A's to C's and back with no explanation) and he is not interested in supporting his students or the learning process whatsoever.
